description: Make this delicious herb and chicken salt seasoning to level up roast vegetables and roast chicken. You can also pop it in a jar and gift it to loved ones.
name: Herb & Chicken Salt Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place thyme, in a single layer, on a paper towel-lined plate. Cover with another paper towel. Microwave on high for 1 minute 30 seconds or until completely dry and crisp. Cool for 10 minutes.
Remove thyme leaves from sprigs and place in a small food processor with remaining ingredients. Process until combined and salt is crushed slightly. Transfer to a sterilised jar.
